OCD.description: Configuration for the Tracker Measurement Logger Instance
OCD.name: Tracker Measurement Logger

AD.name: Wiring group name
AD.description: Name of the group of components that will be wired together.

AD.name: Consumable measurement name
AD.description: List of the names of the wire measurement products to log. Use only the prefix of the measurement product names, as each prefix entered in this list will have the .measurement suffix automatically appended.

AD.name: Type of logger
AD.description: Kind of transaction logger to create. Normalized - log entries are comma delimited and include all measurements. Aggregated - Separate log entries per measurement.

AD.name: Logger name
AD.description: Name of the file to send logs.
